Status

From McXtraceWiki

Jump to: navigation, search

Events

  • Oct. 2011 Use of McXtrace as part of M. Thomsen's Master's thesis project. "Inspection of subcutaneous injections by x-ray absorption tomography"
  • Sep. 2011 McXtrace 1.0 released! See installation and download for details.
  • Nov. 2010 First external use of McXtrace in a feasibility study.
  • Oct. 2010 Release candidate 1 released Including packaged versions for Linux, Windows and Mac OSX.
  • Oct. 2009 First beta
  • Vacancies at Uni Copenhagen filled by Jan Baltser, Andrea Prodi @ NBI and Søren Kynde @ Life
  • Mar. 2009 Erik Knudsen employed as researcher at Risø DTU
  • Sep. 2009 SRI conference , Melbourne Australia
  • Feb. 2009 SMEXOS meeting, Grenoble
  • Jan. 2009 Project startup

Planned events

  • Apr. 2011 Draft versions of User manual and Component manual available
  • Aug. 2011 Presentation at the SPIE conference, San Diego, CA, USA
